channel.title: Chef Frank’s Seasoning Recipes on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Chef Frank’s Seasoning Recipes on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Delicious Homemade Teriyaki Chicken
item.description: Teriyaki chicken with homemade sauce contains pineapple, garlic, brown sugar and soy sauce. It’s great for the barbecue grill outside, or inside under your broiler. Teriyaki chicken can be served with wild rice, salads or fruits or all the above. Great on the barbecue grill! Teriyaki Chicken Ingredients serves 4-6 2 whole chickens cut in 1/8’s, fresh 2 c Teriyaki sauce (see recipe below) 1 tbs. Chef Frank’s Seasoning Method #1 In large roasting pan, place chicken, seasoning, and teriyaki sauce.

item.title: Fresh Summer Cucumber Salad
item.description: Fresh from the garden comes this wonderful cucumber salad with fresh summer garden tomato, and onion. Simple and delicious for steak or rib cookouts and family meals. Cucumber Salad – Fresh Summer Garden Salad Ingredients 1 large seedless cucumber 1/2 large sweet onion 1 fresh tomato 1/2 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 3 c. apple cider vineager 1 tbsp sugar 1/2 c. water Cucumber Salad – Fresh Summer Garden Salad Directions Cut vegetables into large chunks (bite size) and place into right sized bowl.

item.title: Holiday Prime Rib Roast with Au Jus
item.description: Celebrate the Holidays with our very special Prime Rib Roast recipe. It includes an awesome Au Jus recipe. Follow the links to festive side dishes too. Prime Rib Roast Ingredients 15-19 lb rib roast 1/4 c garlic, fresh chopped 1 tbsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 c water Prime Rib Directions Place rib roast in large roasting pan, bone down, add water and seasonings. Cover and place in oven at 275* and roast for 5 hours then check with thermometer.

item.title: Honey Barbecue Country Ribs
item.description: Chef Frank’s honey barbecue country ribs are slow cooked until tender and will wow your family and friends at yourback yard Barbecue. Honey Barbecue Country Ribs Ingredients 3 lb country pork ribs 1/2 onion, cut chunky 1/2 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning pinch white pepper 1 to 2 c honey barbecue sauce 1/2 c water Honey Barbecue Country Ribs Directions In roasting pan, place ribs, water, onion, and seasoning. Cover and roast at 275* for 2 -1/2 hours.

item.title: Honey Barbecued Baby Back Ribs
item.description: Chef Frank’s Honey Barbecued Baby Back Ribs are so delicious and easy to prepare in the oven or on the barbecue grill. Great with roasted red potatoesand salador fruit. Honey Barbecue Baby Back Ribs Ingredients 3 lb or more baby back pork ribs 1/2 onion, cut chunky 1/2 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning pinch white pepper 1 c honey barbecue sauce 1 c barbecue sauce (if you prefer regular barbecue sauce without honey) 1/2 c water Honey Barbecue Baby Back Ribs Directions In roasting pan, place ribs, water, onion, and seasoning.

item.title: Honey Teriyaki Barbecue Sauce
item.description: Our honey teriyaki barbecue sauce will become a staple in your recipe file. It’s easy to prepare on the stove and great for the barbecue grillfor ribs, chicken, chops and steaks. Honey Teriyaki Barbecue Sauce Ingredients 2 c ketchup 1/2 c honey 1 tbsp yellow mustard 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1/2 onion small diced 1 tbsp garlic, fresh chopped 1/4 c brown sugar 3 tbsp soy sauce 1 c pineapple juice ( or 1 c, pureed fresh pineapple) 2 tbsp Italian herb seasoning 1 tsp ground rosemary 1/2 c red wine 1/8 c molasses 2 tbsp grape jelly Combine ingredients in sauce pan, simmer for 1/2 hour or until reduced, stirring frequently.

item.title: Lake Michigan Broiled Whitefish
item.description: Let’s have broiled whitefish from Lake Michigan. Simply place on foil pie pan, butter, season, and broil. Serve with drawn butter or tartar sauce. Serve with any side dish, salad, rice, or potato. Broiled Whitefish Ingredients 1 disposable. pie tin 9″-10″ 2 fresh whitefish (preferred from Lake Michigan) 2oz. butter melted couple shakes of Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1/2 lemon 2 oz. water Broiled Whitefish Directions Place whitefish in pan, then add water (do not spray pan as skin will come off when cooked).

item.title: Pork Roast with Michigan Apples
item.description: Slow cooked pork roast with fresh Michigan apples and spices. Tender and juicy and served with stuffing or potatoes, salad and of course, our satisfying desserts. Pork Roast With Michigan Apples Ingredients Serves 5 – 8 3 lb pork shoulder roast or fresh ham 1 medium onion 2 Michigan apples, peeled cut in chunks 1/2 c applesauce 1 tsp. Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1 tsp sage 1/2 tsp black pepper 1 c water Pork Roast With Michigan Apples Directions Place roast in roasting pan, place all ingredients on top of roast.

item.title: Roasted Chicken Entree
item.description: Roast chicken is a quick recipe for a nice supper. All of our side dish recipes are compatible, and hot rolls with butter tops it off. Roasted Chicken For 4 1 whole chicken (rinsed) 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1 tsp sage (rubbed) black pepper to taste 1 tsp garlic (granulated or fresh chopped) 3 tbsp butter (melted) Roasted Chicken Directions Place chicken breast side up in roaster pan.

item.title: Roasted Turkey Recipes For The Holidays
item.description: Fill your house with the aroma of our festive oven roasted turkey. Wonderful for family celebrations and Holiday meals. Oven Roasted Turkey Ingredients 20-25 lb turkey (Thawed if frozen 2-3 days in fridge) rinse under cold water before cooking 3 tbs rubbed sage 3 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 3 tbsp melted butter 2 c water Roasted Turkey Directions In large roasting pan place turkey, breast side up. Brush with melted butter, then rub with sage.

item.title: Scallops Newburg With Buttery Cream Sauce
item.description: Make scallops newburg with large Sea Scallops and a buttery cream sauce. Then place over rice and serve with Broccoli and cheese and a Salad. A nice mellow white wine compliments this meal. Scallops Newburg Ingredients 2 lbs scallops (large size is better) 1/4 c small diced onion 1/4 c small diced celery 2 oz. maitre d’ butter 1/2 c roux 3 c milk 1/2 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning Scallops Newburg Directions Prepare cream sauce by heating milk and paprika over medium heat in double boiler, or carefully in sauce pan.

item.title: Shrimp and Angel Hair Pasta
item.description: Shrimp and Angel Hair Pasta Ingredients Serves 4 1 lb shrimp, raw, peeled, deveined, (size of your choice) 2 oz. maitre d’ butter 1/2 lb fresh sliced mushrooms 1 tsp garlic, fresh chopped 1/4 onion, diced 1 tsp. Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 tsp olive oil 2 lbs. angel hair pasta Shrimp and Angel Hair Pasta Directions Place pan of water on stove med. high heat to boil water, add a small amount of salt.

item.title: Simple and Tasty Potato Wedges
item.description: Try these easy potato wedges made from red, russet, or sweet potatoes. Simply cut wedges, butter, season, and bake. Potato wedges are a great snack or side dish for any main entree. Potato Wedges Ingredients serves 6-10 4 large potatoes 1/4 c butter, melted 1/4 c grated Parmesan cheese Chef Frank’s Seasoning to taste garlic to taste(granulated or fresh chopped) Potato Wedges Directions Cut potatoes the long way into wedges(about 3-4 per halve).

item.title: Simple Lime Chicken Entree
item.description: Delicious lime chicken, southwest style, made from cut up chicken or boneless breasts. Fresh lime and zest with Chef Frank’s Seasoning, puts it over the top! Lime Chicken Ingredients 1 chicken cut in 1/8’s or ( 8 chicken breasts) boneless skinless 4 limes or 4 tbsp lime juice 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1 tsp southwest or tex mex seasoning 1 tsp paprika 2 tbsp melted butter 1 lime for lime zest (peel skin and slice very thin, place over chicken before cooking) Lime Chicken Directions Baking Method Place chicken in baking dish.

item.title: Simple Vegetarian Goulash
item.description: vegetarian goulash is a delicious recipe made with tomato sauce, pasta, fresh cut vegetables and cheese. Great for Lunch or Supper and can be served with salads, vegetables, fruit, and hot rolls with honey butter. Vegetarian Goulash Ingredients Serves 8 1 lb macaroni, cooked 8 min., drained 1 tsp. olive oil 1/2 onion, diced 1/2 green pepper, diced 1 rib celery, diced small 1 12oz. can tomato sauce 1 12oz.

item.title: Slow Roasted Cornish Game Hen
item.description: Wonderful Cornish game hen, slow roasted and stuffed with apple walnut sage stuffing, or plain roasted served with wild rice. This recipe makes Holidays or any day special. Slow Roasted Cornish Game Hen Ingredients Non-Stuffed Cornish Game Hen 1 Cornish game hen per serving as follows: 2 tbs melted butter 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1 tsp rubbed sage pepper to taste thoroughly rinse with cold water, pat dry, then place game hens in roasting pan back side down.

item.title: Stuffed Pork Loin Recipe
item.description: Stuffed pork loin with fresh raspberry sauce is a wonderful Holiday or Fall entree. The stuffing can be made with either walnuts or pecans. for presentation, slice and shingle onto a platter or tray. Stuffed Pork Loin With Raspberry Sauce Stuffing: 4 c water 2tsp chicken base 1/2 lg. onion diced 2 ribs celery diced 1 tsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 tbsp sage 2 apples, peeled, diced 1/2 stick butter 1 c chopped pecans Place all ingredients above in medium sauce pan.

item.title: Tartar Sauce For Fish
item.description: Quick Tartar Sauce Recipe makes fish meals complete. With a touch of lemon, Tartar Sauce is great with Fried Clams or Walleye, and Fish and Chips. Tartar Sauce Ingredients 1 c mayonaise or salad dressing 1/2 c sweet pickle relish 1 -2 tbsp lemon juice 1/2 tsp. Chef Frank’s Seasoning Tartar Sauce Directions Mix ingredients together well, serve with fish and other seafoods. Refrigerate, covered. Note: Did you know that by adding 1/4 c ketchup to this recipe you have a great Thousand Island sauce.

item.title: Thyme Chicken Breast Entree
item.description: Thyme chicken breast is prepared with fresh thyme, herbs and spices, then baked in the oven. It makes a good partner to wild rice, or roasted red potatoes, corn bread, salad or fruit. Thyme Chicken Breast Ingredients serves 4 4 Chicken breasts, boneless 1 tbsp crushed thyme 1 tsp. Chef Frank’s Seasoning 2 oz. Maitre d’ butter (Click link or see recipe below) Thyme Chicken Breast Directions ### Oven Method: Place chicken breasts on greased sheet pan.

item.title: Vegetarian Honey Barbecue Sauce
item.description: Prepare this vegetarian honey barbecue sauce recipe when you’re grilling outside or cooking inside. It makes your vegetarian burgers, and ribs taste amazing. Vegetarian Honey Barbecue Sauce Ingredients 1 c ketchup 1/2 c honey 1 tbsp yellow mustard 1 tbsp Chef Frank’s Seasoning 1/2 onion small diced 1 tbsp garlic, fresh chopped 1/4 c brown sugar 1/8 c vinegar 1 tbsp soy sauce 2 tbsp Italian herb seasoning 1 tsp ground rosemary 1/2 c red wine 1/8 c molasses Combine ingredients in sauce pan, simmer for 1/2 hour, stirring frequently.
